label: CommonGramTokenFilter
description: Construct bigrams for frequently occurring terms while indexing. Single terms are still indexed too, with bigrams overlaid. Implemented using Apache Lucene.

fields.label: Ignore Case
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether common words matching will be case insensitive. Default is false.

fields.label: Query Mode
fields.tooltip: A value that indicates whether the token filter is in query mode. When in query mode, the token filter generates bigrams and then removes common words and single terms followed by a common word. Default is false.
